dialogue.htmlContent: Entrance to the rat warrens. Rat-morph guards.

Twisting passageways through the rat warrens. In some places very narrow, others wide. Some parts have stone walls, other wood, and in some places, just bare dirt.

If corridor not cleared:
Rats sometimes loitering about who give you funny looks or make an occasional comment.
Else:
Corridors clear, as the rats loitering about here rushed to the entrance (and were defeated by you).
Bunk beds line the walls, and wooden tables and chairs are haphazardly placed in the middle of the room. If night , lots of rats sleeping here. In day, just a couple milling about.
Large room with a bar down one side, and tables in the middle. In day, rats gambling. At night, quieter, but still some around.
Stocks in the middle of the room, with human girls being milked. Chains and manacles bolted into one wall.
Huge stone hall. A dozen long, wooden tables. At the far end, a raised dais, with a throne sitting atop it.
